overview: In this story, everyday objects have their own consciousness but humanity has no idea about it. Airat – a button that lives on a young man’s scarf – accidentally comes off and gets lost in the street. Since this moment, his incredible adventure begins, during which he gets acquainted with other lost and unwanted things, and even finds his love. Though things and people are very different, everyone wants to be needed and loved.
title: Airat Means Amazing
